'''Azure Excursion''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 4.2]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-11-28 18:00:00 &ndash; 2023-12-19 14:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Pillar of Fortitude" [[Kamisato Ayato]] ({{Hydro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Cat Upon the Eaves" [[Kirara]] ({{Dendro}}), "Mender of Tribulations" [[Kuki Shinobu]] ({{Electro}}), and "Exquisite Delicacy" [[Xiangling]] ({{Pyro}})  will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
